mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(`id`) FROM `event_type` WHERE `id` = #{id}
SELECT count(1) FROM `event_type` FOR UPDATE
SELECT MAX(`rht`) FROM `event_type`
SELECT a.`id`, a.`name`, a.`parent_id` AS parentId, a.`lft`, a.`rht`, 0 as `childCount` FROM `event_type` a WHERE a.`lft` <= #{lft} AND a.`rht` >= #{rht} ORDER BY `lft` ASC
SELECT a.`id`, a.`name`, a.`parent_id` AS parentId, a.`lft`, a.`rht` FROM `event_type` a WHERE a.`lft` < #{lft} AND a.`rht` > #{rht} order by a.`lft` limit 1
SELECT a.`id`, a.`name`, a.`parent_id` as parentId, a.`lft`, a.`rht`, a.`layer` as layer FROM `event_type` a WHERE a.`lft` > #{lft} AND a.`rht` < #{rht} and a.`layer` < #{layer}
SELECT count(1) FROM `event_type` WHERE `lft` <= #{lft} AND `rht` >= #{rht}

select count(1) as solutionCount from ( SELECT b.`solution_id` FROM `event_type` a JOIN `event_type_solution` b ON b.`event_type_id` = a.`id` WHERE lft <=#{lft} and rht >=#{rht} group by b.`solution_id` )a

SELECT COUNT(a.`id`) FROM ( SELECT `id` FROM `event_type` WHERE `lft` IS NULL OR `rht` IS NULL UNION SELECT `id` FROM `event_type` WHERE `lft` < 2 OR `rht` < 3 UNION SELECT parent.`id` FROM `event_type` parent JOIN `event_type` child ON child.`parent_id`=parent.`id` AND (child.`lft` <= parent.`lft` OR child.`rht` >= parent.`rht`) UNION SELECT parent.`id` FROM `event_type` parent LEFT JOIN `event_type` child ON child.`parent_id` = parent.`id` WHERE child.id IS NULL AND parent.`rht` - parent.`lft` != 1 ) a

SELECT a.`id`, a.`name`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM `event_type` WHERE `parent_id` = a.`id`) as `childCount`, a.`parent_id` as `parentId`, a.`lft`, a.`rht`, a.`layer` FROM `event_type` a WHERE `id` = #{id}

SELECT a.`id`, a.`name`, a.`parent_id` AS parentId, a.`lft`, a.`rht`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM `event_type` WHERE `parent_id` = a.`id`) as `childCount` FROM `event_type` a WHERE a.`parent_id` = #{value} ORDER BY `lft` ASC
SELECT a.`id`, a.`name`, a.`parent_id` AS parentId, a.`lft`, a.`rht`, a.`layer` FROM `event_type` a WHERE a.`parent_id` = #{parentId}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM `event_type` WHERE `id` = #{id} AND `lft` > #{lft} AND `rht` < #{rht}
SELECT a.`id`, a.`name`, a.`parent_id` AS parentId, a.`lft`, a.`rht`, a.`layer` FROM `event_type` a WHERE a.`parent_id` = #{parentId} ORDER BY a.`lft` ASC limit #{startNum}, 1
SELECT a.`id`, a.`name`, a.`parent_id` AS parentId, a.`lft`, a.`rht`, a.`layer` FROM `event_type` a WHERE a.`lft` > #{lft} and a.`rht` < #{rht}
SELECT `id` FROM `event_type` WHERE `lft` > #{lft} and `rht` < #{rht}
select `event_type_id`, `type`, `uuid` from event_type_authority where `event_type_id` = #{eventTypId}
select count(s.`id`) from `event_solution` s left join `event_type_solution` ets on s.`id` = ets.`solution_id` where ets.`event_type_id` = #{eventTypId}

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT b.`solution_id`) FROM `event_type` a LEFT JOIN `event_type_solution` b ON b.`event_type_id` = a.`id` left join `event_solution` c on c.`id` = b.`solution_id` WHERE a.`lft` <=#{lft} and a.`rht` >=#{rht}
and c.`is_active` = #{isActive}

select s.`id`, s.`name` from `event_solution` s left join `event_type_solution` ets on s.`id` = ets.`solution_id` where ets.`event_type_id` = #{id}
LIMIT #{startNum}, #{pageSize}

SELECT `id`, `name`, `lft`, `rht`, `parent_id` AS `parentId` FROM `event_type` WHERE `id` IN
#{id}
SELECT count(1) FROM `event_type` WHERE `lft` >#{lft} and `rht` < #{rht} and `name` = #{name} and `layer` = #{layer} and `id` != #{id}
SELECT count(1) FROM `event_type` WHERE `name` = #{name} and `id` != #{id} and `parent_id` = #{parentId}
mapper.delete: DELETE a,b FROM `event_type` a LEFT JOIN `event_type_authority` b on a.`id` = b.`event_type_id` WHERE a.`lft` >= #{lft} AND a.`rht` <= #{rht}
